name: Teomim Island
summary:
Teomim Island Is a Short Singleplayer Experience, You will need to explore the island to progress, The environment is dark and a big part of the island is its forest walking there at night time is dangerous this is why you are a trained professional, Loot is found all around the island collect as much supplies as you can because you're not alone, There are many wolves that inhabit the island you will need to protect yourself from them by using firearms found all over the island, As you go along you will find yourself fighting wolves and some other creatures and you will get injured, But don't worry you will find plenty of Medkits, Armored Vests and Painkillers to patch yourself up.
As you progress you will find some mysteries that you will have to solve by collecting particular items or killing.
